div.p: Please review the following resources provided by the Ohio Department of Health (ODH) regarding the Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19).

The Ohio Department of Health opened a call center to answer questions regarding the Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19). The call center is open 7 days a week from 9:00 AM to 8:00 PM and can be reached at 1-833-427-5634.

Cuyahoga County established a helpline for residents who have general questions about COVID-19/Coronavirus. This helpline is in addition to the Ohio Department of Health's call center. The helpline can be reached at 1-855-711-3035.

The Ohio Department of Mental Health and Addiction Services created the COVID CareLine to provide confidential emotional support to individuals who may be struggling to cope with current challenges in their lives. The careline is open 7 days a week from 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM. It's toll-free and can be reached at 1-800-720-9616.

A multilingual resources page has been developed on the Cuyahoga County website and contains COVID-19/Coronavirus resources in Arabic, Chinese, Nepali, Russian and Spanish.
View Multilingual Resources

Constellation Schools: Westpark Community Middle does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its programs and activities and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups. The following person has been designated to handle inquiries regarding non-discrimination policies:
